text: aur boodhee boodhee auraten jo (budhaape kee vajah se) nikaah kee khvaahish nahee rakhatee vah agar apane kapade (dupatte vagairaah) utaarakar (sar nanga) kar daalen to usamen un par kuchh gunaah nahee hai- basharte ki unako apana banaav singaar dikhaana manzoor na ho aur (is se bhee) bachen to unake lie aur behatar hai aur khuda to (sabakee sab kuchh) sunata aur jaanata hai
